function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data-driven approach development for COVID-19 clustering algorithm","Impact":"Failure to identify effective clustering algorithm","Mitigation":"Deploy multiple clustering algorithms to compare results","Technologies":"Data clustering algorithms, machine learning","People":"Data scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Decentralized IoT-based system for regulating population flow during COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Ineffective regulation of population flow","Mitigation":"Use GPS and tracking data for accurate population flow monitoring","Technologies":"IoT, GPS tracking, population flow modeling","People":"Public health officials, government agencies","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Social distancing monitoring schemes using robots and surveillance technology","Impact":"Failure to accurately monitor social distancing and detect individuals with higher-than-normal temperature","Mitigation":"Use advanced sensors and image processing to improve accuracy","Technologies":"Robotics, thermal imaging, sensor technology","People":"Public health officials, security personnel","Owner":"Public health organizations, security companies"}]}
